title: I don't like my friend's music, so what do I do? What do I say? - Quora

response.answer_text: Live and let live. Enjoy your music and let them enjoy their own. You can share some new music with them if they are open to it; otherwise, don’t complain about it. Don’t judge them and complain unless you want them to get angry. You can leave if you can’t stand to listen to it. If they prefer their music to you, then you haven’t lost a good friend.

You means his music taste or the music he writes. If he is your freind, and your taste diverge, you can either say the music is Good, hear it once or twice and he will be happy or the risky way, tell him you dont like the music much. However if he wrote that music, depends. Does He acccepts critics, if so tell him, that for you the music lacks something, maybe lacks that sweet beat. Or just say its Good and survive, may be painfull for you in long term. Either way, i recomend for you to keep it for your self unless your freind accept crit, you don't want to destroy your self estem.
